snippet.title: after HOURS trailer
snippet.description:
Warning: This trailer contains material that might be triggering to sexual abuse survivors.

This is the official trailer to a game that we're making called after HOURS. It's about a young woman that was sexually abused as a child and has BPD as a result. after HOURS will be released at the end of October this year.
